entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
